Text.Value: Marvellous. Onward, then.
Mystra? What does she want of me?
Elminster?
The very same, Gale. And a fair bit miffed he is, too, finding himself forced to expose his best pair of boots to so many miles of country road on your behalf.
Well, boots are made for walking. I believe a bard once said something similar.
Mystra? What does she want of me?
Mystra, aye, m'boy. But what she wants is a matter better discussed in more comfortable environs. Knowing you, I'll wager your camp is a veritable home away from home.
What, nothing at all to say? It's me, Gale - Elminster. And quite some lengths I've taken - figurative and literal - to clap eyes on you.
Perhaps I didn't convey the gravity of the situation, if you think you have better things to be doing. But very well, I shall see you there.
Nor did I ask to play bloodhound, yet here we are.
Come now, Gale. It's me - Elminster. And quite some lengths I've taken - figurative and literal - to clap eyes on you.
My sympathies for your wearied soles. Care to explain what you're doing?
Lead the way - then I can rest these bones of mine for a spell, and you can learn all I have to share.
All right, let's go.
I was bid to spare neither time nor my own self to find you. She sent me, Gale. You know of whom I speak.
Say nothing.
I'm not feeling all that indulgent just now.
Elminster?
Ho there, wanderer. Stay thy course a moment to indulge an old man.
Why, I've reduced my best boots to mere shadows of their former glory in pursuit of you.
Mystra, of course. But what she wants is a matter better discussed in more comfortable environs. Knowing you, I'll wager your camp is a veritable home away from home.
Head to my camp yourself. I'll join when I can.
Spare me the chagrin - I didn't ask for you to track me down.
Is that so? It must have escaped my ears. But no matter - this is far more important than some worn leather.
All right, let's go.
Don't keep me in suspense, Elminster.
My sympathies for your wearied soles. Care to explain what you're doing?

Synopsis:
AOM or OOM that triggers when talking to Elminster.

Elminster does a brief introduction before joining the camp, potentially taking the players along.
Can trigger in either Creche or SCL.
